title: Microsoft says AI can create “zero day” threats in biology
description: A team at Microsoft says it used artificial intelligence to discover a “zero day” vulnerability in the biosecurity systems used to prevent the misuse of DNA. title: Who controls the machines that control Artificial Intelligence?
